name: zombie dog game
description:
backstory: you are a zombie out in the wild and need to find 5 medkit around the map in order to be cured and win!

the catch... you will be timed and 3 dog(s) will attack you

 unless you give them a treat in order to tame them as your pet.

good luck! (also do not fall off map!)

warning: non-copy right music is being used! 

control:

w 

asd

space 

left click
